text: Anatoly Fyodorovich Dobrynin was a Russian statesman and a Soviet diplomat. He was the Soviet Ambassador to the United States. He served during the Cuban Missile Crisis. Dobrynin worked with 6 American presidents. He was well liked in the United States. ==Honours and awards== * Hero of Socialist Labour * Five Orders of Lenin * Order of the Red Banner of Labour * Order of Honour ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Moscow Oblast Category:Recipients of the Order of Lenin Category:Ambassadors of the Soviet Union
title: Anatoly Dobrynin
